column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last summer I decided it would be a fantastic idea to visit my friend on the other side of the country .
#text=Normally I might drive , as I do n't mind driving , but I was on a tight schedule with work and needed to keep the trip short .
#text=I visited an airline price comparing website , and ultimately chose to book a flight from Charlotte where I lived to San Francisco where my friend lived .
#text=The airline was a well known carrier , American , and the round trip fare was phenomenal at only $ 150 .
#text=After I booked the flight , I was emailed a boarding pass to print out .
#text=The day of the flight I brought my luggage and boarding pass with me to the airport .
#text=Inside the airport , I visited the ticket counter to present my boarding pass and luggage .
#text=My luggage was checked-in for a small fee , leaving me free to board the plane without having to carry the burden of all that weight .
#text=I had to wait through a security line and get checked for illegal items before proceeding to the gate .
#text=Once at the gate I showed my boarding pass again and walked onto the plane .
#text=I was directed towards my assigned seat in the economy class cabin .
#text=After a few more minutes the plane pushed back and began taxiing to the runway .
#text=During this time other passengers and myself were instructed to buckle our seat belts and watch a safety demonstration on what to do in the event of an in-flight emergency .
#text=We then took off , climbed to about 34,000 feet , and roamed the skies westward .
#text=I slept for the remainder of the flight .
#text=Upon waking up the plane was just touching down .
#text=It was a very quick flight , only 5 hours .
#text=I stepped off the plane and walked to baggage pickup .
#text=When my bags came around the belt , I picked them up and walked outside , where my friend was waiting for me .
#text=All in all it was a fun and painless journey .
